text: A disconnecting switch (or disconnector) is an electrical switch used in high- voltage electrical circuits to isolate the section which has electricity from the section with no electricity. This is done for a full safety method during electrical equipment maintenance or service. They are primarily used for the isolation of various substation equipment, including circuit breakers, power transformers, capacitor banks, and reactors. ==Related pages== * Circuit breaker ==References== Category:Electricity
title: Disconnecting switch
